name: DEATH CROWN — alpha
description:
DEATH CROWN is a dynamic strategy game with local multiplayer, easy controls with retro 1-bit visual style.  Inspired by the Close Castles.
You need to destroy the stronghold of the enemy, before your enemy will destroy yours. Correctly chosen strategy determines the winner of the battle.

Features:
  • Easy to play
  • Classic retro art
  • Easy gamepad control
Hint Control:

two gamepads strongly recomended!

Gamepade Keyboard P1 Keyboard P2 Title Cost Description Y I Num 5 Farm/Pit 20 Press to build Farm/Pit for money. X J Num 1 Barracks/Crypt 20 Press to build Barracks/Crypt for to recruit army. B L Num 3 Tower/Obelisk 10 Press to build Tower/Obelisk for defend. hold A hold K hold Num 2 Road 0 Hold to build Road for to direct the army from Barracks/Crypt to enemies. Left Stick WASD Arrows cursor control
